programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Nothing Dull About Sharpsburg
programme.desc: Ed and Day spend the day making their way through Sharpsburg. The guys get physical with MMA, try making pizza, and swing by 4FourSix Distillery and Hitchhiker Brewing for some drinks.

programme.title: Plate It Picklesburgh
programme.desc: Plate It Picklesburgh

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Botched Crimes
programme.desc: Sometimes, would-be criminals are their own worst enemies. This episode highlights crime “fails,” and the officers - and ordinary civilians - who save the day.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Toy Box Killer
programme.desc: One evening in 1999, Cythnia Jaramillo shows up at a home wearing nothing but a dog collar. She had been tortured and sexually assaulted for days. Her escape leads investigators to discover a gruesome string of kidnappings and murders.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: Host Frank Nicotero visits "The Big Easy" armed with trivia questions about the unbelievable things people have seen in a bottle, under a church floorboard and even inside a mail truck!

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Screens Off, Adventure On!
programme.desc: Camryn Simpson, a 21-year-old student at the University of Pittsburgh and ambassador on social media platforms can’t take time away from her phone. With the help of Kinga, Camryn will log-out of social media and log-in to the outdoors to find adventure.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Sports Town Stories: KC Sports Heroes Redefine What it Means to be Top of Your Game
programme.desc: From a dance instructor who prioritizes mental health for her students, to a high school baseball coach who exemplified courage, KC athletes show off their formulas for success.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: New connections form in the most unlikely places. In this episode, chance encounters forge lasting friendships and transformative relationships.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Huge Evidence Hauls Seen on the Force
programme.desc: Whether it’s gathering thousands of mysterious, colorful packets stuffed in a store’s ceiling or valuable wildlife slithering to freedom, investigators must be ready to decisively face a range of mammoth tasks in the field.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: She Ate What Out of Her Pocket?
programme.desc: What strange snack did a woman eat at a football game? What ice cream flavor was inspired by a hot dog topping? Frank Nicotero is asking these questions and more, as Cincinnati locals try to win cash prizes.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot: Lifestyle Blogger, Male Model, & Reality TV Star Shout Out Top Spots
programme.desc: Our KC experts include a Savage X Fenty model who also walks his own line, an MTV star who's turning carnivores on to the #plantlife and a local blogger with the scoop on where to let your dog off-leash while enjoying an adult beverage.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Caving Into Fun In Lincoln, NE
programme.desc: Explore a historic cave with timeless messages on its walls. Savor every last crumb of a Cookie Monster waffle. Test your putt-putt skills on a hole designed to get the better of you.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Missing Link in the Mardi Gras Murders
programme.desc: The brutal murders of two trans women of color just 48 hours apart in New Orleans unsettle the community, leaving many wondering if the cases are connected. Detectives uncover clues, yet justice remains elusive.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Sports Town Stories: Iowa Athletes Embody Midwestern Grit
programme.desc: Whether it's a wrestling star training through grief, champion rollerskaters challenged on the world stage, or a cycling team pushing through obstacles, Iowans don't back down when the going gets tough.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Selective Single Getting Creative to Find Love
programme.desc: Randi, a 29-year-old single from Omaha, is ready to date three lovely ladies. Will she find a connection with Karen, will Leia pull all the right heartstrings or will things get spicy with Emily?

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Put That Sauce on Anything
programme.desc: Chef Manny Hernandez of Barrels and Boards in Raynham pushes the pace against Chef Ryan Dziki of Wild Fox Pierogi. Will the chefs be able to identify the right ingredients and replicate each other’s sauces before the clock runs out?

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Celebrate the stories from across the country of community members uniting to uplift and support each other, from nonprofits to athletic organizations, schools and everyday individuals who change lives every day.

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.sub-title: Show Me Milwaukee: Light Up the City
programme.desc: What’s the best way to experience Milwaukee? By boat! Greg gets a kayaking tour from the founder of Support Local MKE, Marleigh Petras, who shows him all the best spots to hit along the Menomonee River.

programme.title: Plate It Picklesburgh
programme.desc: Plate It Picklesburgh

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: Frank Nicotero takes to the streets to quiz people on the wildest, wackiest news stories. In "Imagination Station," contestants answer questions for cash about witty co-workers, life-saving screenings and teaching telemarketers a lesson.

programme.title: Chronicle: Slice of the 'Burgh
programme.desc: (2023) An exploration into what makes Pittsburgh’s pizza scene so special, and the impact pizza shops have on their communities.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: It's not a Steelers game without the food. Chef Cory Hughes and Chef Les Murphy face off in the kitchen gridiron to see who can score the best Steelers tailgating dishes.

programme.title: Grit of Greenwood
programme.desc: Greenwood was a thriving Black district in Tulsa when, 100 years ago, it was destroyed in less than 24 hours.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.desc: Maker Nation

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: Matter of Fact
programme.sub-title: Matter of Fact: Immigration Raid Impact
programme.desc: This week Matter of Fact travels to Postville, Iowa to look at the long-term impacts of a mass immigration raid. Plus, an expert explains how Medicaid cuts could change people’s health care coverage and more. And, why a Chinese-American researcher is issuing a warning.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Chronicle: Quip Town
programme.desc: (2024) An all-access look at the Aliquippa high school football team's journey to repeat as state champions, from training camp through the season, all while battling numerous obstacles.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: It's not a Steelers game without the food. Chef Cory Hughes and Chef Les Murphy face off in the kitchen gridiron to see who can score the best Steelers tailgating dishes.

programme.title: Chronicle: The Terrible Towel
programme.desc: (2022) As a symbol of Steelers victory, the Terrible Towel has become a sinister sign for other NFL teams. The Towel followed the Steelers from the playoffs through their second Super Bowl win.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Sports Town Stories: Family Drives Pittsburgh Athletes to Excel
programme.desc: From swimmers fueled by loved ones' unconditional support, to basketball and field hockey siblings driving each other toward greatness, see how family and sports are intertwined in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.
